Can only be called by the current owner."}},"stateVariables":{"ORDER_TYPEHASH":{"details":"EIP-712 type hash for Order struct"},"cancelledNonces":{"details":"maker \u2192 nonce \u2192 cancelled"},"settledOrders":{"details":"order hash \u2192 settled (prevents replay)"}},"title":"LedgerExchange","version":1},"userdoc":{"kind":"user","methods":{"cancelOrders(uint256[])":{"notice":"Cancel one or more of your own orders by nonce."},"settle((address,uint256,uint256,bool,uint256,uint256,uint256),bytes,(address,uint256,uint256,bool,uint256,uint256,uint256),bytes)":{"notice":"Settle a matched buy/sell order pair."}},"notice":"Settles matched orders from the off-chain order book. Flow \u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500 1. User signs an Order off-chain via EIP-712 typed data. 2. Ledger's matching engine pairs a buy order with a sell order. 3. Ledger calls settle() \u2014 funds and NFTs swap atomically. 4. Protocol fee (default 1.5%) is deducted from USDC proceeds. Settlement is denominated in USDC (6 decimals on Base). Users never interact with USDC directly \u2014 the frontend shows USD. Order cancellation \u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500 Users can cancel individual orders by submitting their nonce on-chain. The matching engine also checks cancelled nonces before eip712Domain().details: returns the fields and values that describe the domain separator used by this contract for EIP-712 signature.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

settle((address,uint256,uint256,bool,uin.details: Called by Ledger's matching engine (off-chain). Both makers must         have pre-approved this contract to transfer their assets.         - Buyer approves: usdc.approve(exchange, amount)         - Seller approves: cardNft.setApprovalForAll(exchange, true)

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

cancelOrders(uint256[]).notice: Cancel one or more of your own orders by nonce.

settle((address,uint256,uint256,bool,uin.notice: Settle a matched buy/sell order pair.
